scenario_text.value: Phew... Foraging is tougher than I thought.

I’d chow on some grass, but the weeds around
here are too nasty to eat.

Who knows what season it is here? I don’t see
a single fruit on these trees.

Red spider lilies bloom in the fall, so there
might be some autumn fruits around here...
Haru, wait! Where are you going?!

Looks like he’s headed further into the
forest. What do you think we should do?

Let’s go after him. It’s really dangerous to
be out here all alone.
Shouldn’t we go tell the others?

I want to, but...what happens if we lose
track of Haru?
Yeah, guess we’ll just have to go get him!
